00046 #define BLOAD_DATA 38

00048 struct bloadData
00049   { 
00050    char *BinaryPrefixID;
00051    char *BinaryVersionID;
00052    struct FunctionDefinition **FunctionArray;
00053    int BloadActive;

00055    struct callFunctionItem *AfterBloadFunctions;
00056    struct callFunctionItem *ClearBloadReadyFunctions;
00057    struct callFunctionItem *AbortBloadFunctions;
00058   };
